snippet: There is plenty of blame to go around for the neurological damage caused by toxic fumes at Royale Comfort Seating.
abstract: Editorial condemns exposure of Royale Comfort Seating workers in Taylorsville, NC, to toxic chemical known as n-propyl bromide; contends fault lies with employer but also cites regulatory failure on part of state and federal Occupational Safety and Health Administration; supports Senate bill that would greatly increase penalties but fears bill's prospects are dim, due to House Republicans' opposition to regulation in general.
lead_paragraph: There is plenty of blame to go around for the neurological damage caused by toxic fumes at Royale Comfort Seating.

headline.seo: Saving Money, Poisoning Workers in Taylorsville, N.C.
